creator: cnsilvan@gmail.com
text: I solved, according to the source code found, not in server.xml set hostName will not be reported to the wrong.

creator: markt@apache.org
text: This isn't a Tomcat Native issue. This is a Tomcat issue caused when there is no SSLHostConfig that matches the defaultSSLHostConfigName

creator: markt@apache.org
text:
Fixed in:
- trunk for 9.0.0.M18 onwards
- 8.5.x for 8.5.12 onwards
